text: “Soni (chachiŵa) Ntenga (juchachitumisyidwa) ku ŵanache ŵa Israila (ni chachiŵaga ali nkwasalila yanti): ‘Chisimutu une nam’bichilile ni chisimosimo kuumila kwa M'mbuje gwenu, mwanti chingombolecheje kun'gumbila kutyochela mwilongo chitusitusi cha chijuni nikuchipepelela, basi nikusyuka chijuni chisyesyene mu lisosa lya Allah, ni chimbosyeje ŵangalola kwachipago, ŵachinaŵa, ni kusyusyaga ŵawe mu lisosa lya Allah, chinansalileje soni yachin'dyeje ni yachinsunjeje m’majumba mwenu. Chisimu mu yalakweyi muŵele mwana chimanyilo kukwenu nam'baga jenumanja ŵakulupilila (kusyene).’
